Title: 2025 Christmas most peaceful in many years — CAN
Summary: Archbishop Daniel Okoh described the recently concluded Christmas festive season in Nigeria as the most peaceful in recent years . Okoh made this statement while speaking with newsmen on Friday, after the Christmas .

Title: Adekunle Gold becomes first artist to headline renovated National Theatre
Summary: Adekunle Kosoko made history as the first artist to headline a concert at the newly renovated National Theatre, now known as the Wole Soyinka Centre, Lagos . The sold-out concert, which took place on Thursday, December 26, 2025, made history .

Title: The waves of Christmas
Summary: Christmas sets off a unique season of sobriety. A season of reflection . A season reminding man of his smallness. Yet a time of reminding him of smallness .

Title: 50 years after, drum beats for Timi Laoye
Summary: Oba (Dr.) John Adetoyese Laoye still pulse through Ede, Osun State like a living memory . The rhythms of the Oba still pulse around Ede in Ede like a 'living memory'

Title: Mama Cass announces grand comeback across Nigeria
Summary: Mama Cass has officially announced its return, marking a major comeback for the heritage brand . Mama Cass is one of Nigeria’s most iconic food-service brands .

Title: Seven killed in Gombe auto crash, gov mourns
Summary: The victims were reportedly on their way to Maiduguri, Borno State, to attend a wedding ceremony . The governor commiserated with the families of the victims, particularly the District Head of Jalingo, Bello Hassan Babangida, who lost his sister and niece .

Title: PDP group slams A'Ibom's N31.6bn education allocation, demands review

Title: AU condemns Israel's recognition of Somaliland, reaffirms unity
Summary: Israel became the first country to formally recognise Somaliland, an autonomous region in north-western Somalia that declared independence in 1991 after the collapse of the Somali state . Title: One dies in Anambra road crash
Summary: One person has lost her life while four others sustained varying degrees of injuries in a fatal road accident that occurred at Nawfia axis, near Enugu-Agidi Junction, along the Awka–Onitsha Expressway, Anambra State .
